item.title: Speaking
item.author: raravena80@gmail.com (Ricardo Aravena)
item.description: This is a list of the talks I’ve given 2018-2019 What’s Up With All The Different Container Runtimes? KubeCon/CloudNativeCon EU Copenhagen Denmark 2018 Video Link Slides Spice Up Your Workloads with Kata Containers Open Source Summit NA Vancouver Canada 2018 Link Slides Container Security & Multi-Tenancy Tales from Kata & Nabla KubeCon/CloudNativeCon NA Seattle Washington 2018 Video Link Slides Kubernetes and The GitOps Face-Off KubeCon/CloudNativeCon NA Seattle Washington 2018
